value:
$WmMPID_総選挙ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_ELECTION01,Face|So you've found us. Ready to go
another round?$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_ELECTION01,Face|This is Vaskrheim. We serve as its
guardians.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_ELECTION01,Face|And once this battle is over, we'll be
released from the contract that binds
us here.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙セリカ,ch10_08_Cellica_F_ELECTION01,Face|...Then let that battle commence.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_総選挙エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_ELECTION01,Face|That was a fine demonstration of
strength. I thank you for the fight.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_ELECTION01,Face|And so our duty ends.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙セリカ,ch10_08_Cellica_F_ELECTION01,Face|I thank you, too. I hope we can meet
again. I would like another chance to
express my gratitude.$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_ELECTION01,Face|Summoner... I'm not the Veronica of
this world.$k$pHere, whether Askr or Embla wins...
it doesn't mean a thing to me.$k$pCall for me, and I'll help you.$k$pAfter all, maybe you'll call my brother
to my side someday, too.$k$p$Sbs150|
